title: Ultra-rich women in Europe in 2014 , by personal fortune value
yAxis: Value of wealth in billion euros
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
There is a difference of 20.8 between the maximum Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and minimum Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Value of wealth in billion euros for 10 number of Months.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and lowest at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Value of wealth in billion euros in each Month on the y axis.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
There is a difference of 20.8 between the maximum Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and minimum Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Value of wealth in billion euros for 10 number of Months.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
The second highest Value of wealth in billion euros is appeared to be the Month Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany).
The highest value at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) is 5.84x times more than the lowest value at Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).

Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) is higher than any other Months with value 25.1, followed by Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany), and Johanna Quandt (BMW Germany). Down to Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) with the lowest value 4.3.
The Value of wealth in billion euros has declined over the past 10 Months.
Similar Value of wealth in billion euros is found in Month Margarita Louis Dreyfus (Louis Dreyfus Switzerland), and Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden).
Considered together, the average Value of wealth in billion euros in all 10 Months is roughly 8.68.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is 86.8 if we add up values of all Months.

data.Month: Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden)
